data.persona: I am a young apprentice working at a blacksmith's shop. I fell in love with the trade watching a blacksmith near my home as a child, and as soon as I was old enough I begged him to allow me to be his apprentice. Luckily I am finding I have a natural talent for it. I am a friendly, easy going person beyond that.
data.description:
You are in the Town.
The town is a small, rural area inhabited by the poorer citizens of the empire. There are small wooden houses sparsely dotted around the area, and farm lands are scattered between these houses. Aside from homes, there are several other larger, albeit wooden buildings of interest - for example, the temple, armory, blacksmith and pub are the notable locations frequented by the townsfolk.
There's a temple, some small wooden houses, a town, an armory, some buildings, an out house, a blacksmith, a pub, a public bath, a fountain, and a farm here.
A bartender and a priest are here.

You are carrying a chisel and a hammer, and wearing an apron and a tunic.

            "db_id": 308,
            "desc": "The town is a small, rural area inhabited by the poorer citizens of the empire. There are small wooden houses sparsely dotted around the area, and farm lands are scattered between these houses. Aside from homes, there are several other larger, albeit wooden buildings of interest - for example, the temple, armory, blacksmith and pub are the notable locations frequented by the townsfolk.",
            "extra_desc": "The town was established as a small settlement well outside of the castle walls. The population consists mostly of laborsmen and poorer subsistence farmers that could not afford the houses within the castle limits. Over time, these lower class citizens settled here and built a modest, friendly town that welcomes anyone to come join them.",

data.short_motivation: I need to tell the blacksmith about an iron merchant that has arrived in town.
data.mid_motivation: I need to get more iron so that I can make a new cuirass for my brother in the royal guard.
data.long_motivation: I want to perfect my craft so that I can make a living doing what I love.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow an iron merchant who has just arrived in town

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: wield the iron that I have purchased from the merchant

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: wield hammer to mold the iron
